backend/main.mo: Motoko canister defining user profiles, transfers, cards, loans, insurance, and EMI plans with access control and CRUD-style functions.
feature_evidence.json: Machine‑generated report mapping implemented features to related frontend files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose of each frontend source file for planning and documentation.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind-based global theme defining OKLCH color variables, dark mode values, and base styling tokens.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up TanStack Router with authenticated layout and routes for all banking pages.
frontend/src/components/AppLayout.tsx: Main authenticated layout with header, navigation, user badge, and responsive menu wrapping page content.
frontend/src/components/Auth/LoginButton: Login/logout button handling Internet Identity authentication with loading and error handling.
frontend/src/components/Auth/ProfileSetu: Shows a dialog prompting new authenticated users to fill and submit their profile details.
frontend/src/components/common/QueryStat: Provides reusable loading, empty, and error UI components with optional retry and actions.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages an authenticated or anonymous backend actor and refreshes dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements context and provider for Internet Identity authentication, storing identity and managing login state.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for user profile, transfers, cards, loans, and other backend operations using the actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Configures Tailwind base styles and CSS variables for a light and dark banking theme.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/pages/CardsPage.tsx: Renders a card management page allowing users to view, add, and delete debit or credit cards.
A calculator page that lets users input investment parameters and computes compound interest using utility functions.
frontend/src/pages/DashboardPage.tsx: Fetches and displays a financial overview including stats and recent transfers with links to detailed sections.
frontend/src/pages/EmiPage.tsx: Provides an EMI calculator with rate options and allows saving calculated EMI plans to the backend.
frontend/src/pages/InsurancePage.tsx: Shows selectable insurance categories and a form to submit insurance inquiries, with backend integration and validation.
frontend/src/pages/LoansPage.tsx: Displays loan application tabs for different loan types and submits applications after validating user inputs.
frontend/src/pages/LoginPage.tsx: Renders the landing/login page with Internet Identity sign‑in and a feature overview section. Uses UI components and branding elements for the 9 Sea Bank homepage.
frontend/src/pages/MoneyTransferPage.tsx: Provides a form to submit new money transfers with validation and displays transfer history using backend queries. Includes toast notifications and UI elements for statuses and formatting.
frontend/src/utils/finance.ts: Implements financial utilities including compound interest, EMI calculations, and helpers for currency, number, and date formatting. Used across the app for consistent financial computations.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility helpers for reading, persisting, and clearing URL parameters and session-stored values. Supports both query and hash-based routing.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind theme, colors, fonts, animations, and plugins for the app’s UI design system. Extends utilities and defines design tokens used throughout the frontend.
project_state.json: Tracks project metadata, implemented features, requirements, issues, and image needs for the 9 Sea Bank application.
